entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inefficient codegen using `for` instead of a simple `while`-loop #63544
  • ObjectDisposedException after slightly malformed POST/PUT request in HttpListener #63543
  • Minimal record definition with camel case deserialization uses Pascal Case #63542
  • The JIT generates a redudant `cmp` instruction in accessing memory by pointer #63541
    7.0.0
  • Hit inotify user limit on linux when you start and stop hosts created with Host.CreateDefaultBuilder(args) in a tight loop #63540
  • Implement `IList` interface for all (ordered) dictionary keys #63537
  • Support async NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection for synchronous pipes #63536
  • Setting thread affinity is complicated as AppDomain.GetCurrentThreadId() no longer matches ProcessThread.Id #63535
  • Allow Process.Kill to specify the exit code #63532
  • ping(6) tests are failing on FreeBSD #63530

Closed

  • RegexKnownPatternTests.TerminationInNonBacktrackingVsBackTracking Failures on Linux ARM32 #62873
  • JSON source generator emits CS0618 warnings if serialized types use [Obsolete] #62076
    6.0.x
  • System.Text.Json source generation and records from another assembly #62374
    6.0.x
  • Incorrect translation of Ping error codes #62592
    Future
  • UnwindManagedExceptionPass1 crashes on virtual dispatch stub when handling System.NullReferenceException on macOS ARM64 #62058
  • Missing entries in user.config after decryption/encryption with ConfigurationSaveMode.Full #62233

PullRequests

Created

  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Exception sets: debug checker & fixes #63539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Shared physical file provider with base directory as root #63538
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix escaped strings for TryGetDateTime(Offset) #63534
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63533
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • fix ping with SendIpHeader on FreeBSD #63531
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd
  • [IGNORE] debugging debugger array tests #63528
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix GENERIC_MATH_FEATURE by making sure we always choose the right ref #63525
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Delete duplicated consts in XmlUTF8TextReader #63367
    area-Serialization
  • [release/6.0] Suppress SendPacketsElement_FileStreamMultiPartMixed_MultipleFileStreams_Success test on Windows 11 #63526
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Delete dead null check in XmlQueryRuntime.DocOrderDistinct #63371
    area-System.Xml
  • Delete a dead null check in TransactionStateDelegatedBase.EnterState #63361
    area-System.Transactions
  • Fix debug-only tracing in PhysicalMemoryMonitor.SetLimit #63342
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Increase timeout on regex test #63529
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63196
    Servicing-consider, area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • add instructions for running on FreeBSD #63417
    community-contribution
  • [wasm][tests] Fix, and simplify sample building on CI #63429
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] disable tests unstable on Windows 11 #63527
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Backport build improvements, and fixes from #61581 #62757
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Include properties on records for (de)serialization in source-gen #63454
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62191
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Suppress warnings about [Obsolete] member usage in JSON src-gen'd code #63501
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values (#62798) #63493
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Fix translation of Ping error codes #63237
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62193
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63482
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x

Updated

  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1543194 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-codeflow
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve use of {Last}IndexOf{Any} in Regex loops #63428
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringLanguageAttribute #62995
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Webpack & NextJS & TypeScript samples #63335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fixes of invalid biginteger casting #56710
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix JsonObject constuctor #63150
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Add LoongArch64 support in libunwind. #62979
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Use "read" to fetch misaligned 64bit values from bundle header #63519
    area-Single-File
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix Regex if-then-else code generation #63427
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62643
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix NETStandard library using JSON source gen #63520
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • Fixes Event Log Message Format on Unmanaged FailFast #63517
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Make delegates unsupported by JsonSerializer #63514
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops #63518
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • 'cmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft] hot reload wip #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • Improve auto-atomicity for conditionals #63299
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet watch not running on linux #23238
    7.0.1xx
  • CS8032 error in VS2019 if EnforceCodeStyleInBuild is set and .NET SDK 6 is installed #23261

Updated

  • Windows Update error 0x80070643 trying to install "2021-11 .NET 5.0.12 Update for x64 Client (KB5007884)" #23307
  • Define a platform-agnostic NET preprocessor symbol #22788
    Backlog
  • NETSDK1100 when building projects with multiple TargetFrameworks #23306

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typo in CommonProperties.cs #23339
  • Build Single-File for Windows 7 (.NET 6) #23336
    Area-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542752 #23335
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542711 #23334
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542480 #23332
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542364 #23331
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542280 #23328
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow print rollback when non-admin. #23326
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1542172 #23325
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add an option to run dotnet-watch in non-interactive mode #23309
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/6.0.1xx] bump the error number for CompressionInSingleFileRequiresSelfContained #22676
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1xx
  • Update System.CommandLine #23085
    Area-CLI

Updated

  • Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23177
    Area-External, Area-SingleFile
  • Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ #23318
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add the same condition we have for net 6 to net 7 #23302
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .editorconfig "Value cannot be null. Parameter name: path" at Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.EditorConfigSettings.Extensions.SolutionExtensions.<>c.<G #58732
  • C# code formatting is not respecting .editorconfig #58731

Closed

  • IDE0161 Code Fix Deleting Content #58726
  • A possible easy solution to not build docs-only changes on CI #58710
  • Developers can maintain and modify their code #58270
    Backlog
  • Developers can maintain consistent code by defining coding conventions #58273
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix empty strings in ThrowHelper #58733
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions #58730
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58729
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Don't run CI for docs-only changes #58723
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Remove implicit conversion from string to `ReadOnlySpan<T>` from test source for `ReadOnlySpan<T>`. #58724
    Area-Compilers, Test-Scenario, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1541625 #58721

Updated

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #58736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve syntax diffing of similar nodes #38016
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, Community
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • Use ReadOnlySpan properties over array fields #56845
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • Better parse when lambda expressions contain default parameter values. #58690
    Area-Compilers
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers, Feature - Param Null Checking
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Remove contract check to avoid crash #58675
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P3
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Required modifier parsing #58431
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Minor simplification in EnC #58728
    Area-Interactive
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from TypeScript and F# Inline Rename interfaces #58381
    Area-IDE
  • Rename and share CompilerAnalyzerConfigOptions #58579
    Area-Analyzers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AuthorizeView causes visible UI flashes when using a policy that awaits an async operation in .NET 6 #39386
  • [HttpGet("{id}")]public IActionResult GetById(byte[] id) should be BindingSource.Path #39384
  • Add Results.Stream overload that takes a Func<Stream, Task> #39383
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Can't inject service in ValidationAttribute #39382

Closed

  • Set asp-append-version to true for everything #35553
    Backlog
  • ControllerEndpointRoute API Comment Misunderstood #36279
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow runtime compilation to be configured via the hosting startup. #39381
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Skip `BundlesScopedCssFiles_UpdatesBundleWhenContentsChange()` #39377
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bb92160` to `6b74da4` #39258
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [main] Update Selenium versions #39380
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update Selenium versions #39379
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.2
  • [release/5.0] Update Selenium versions #39378
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Backport Java test fixes #39290
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.2
  • Build ARM64 in main windows build job #38997
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Detect HTTP version on invalid HTTP/2 connection #39358
    area-runtime
  • [release/5.0] Don't exclude System.IO.Pipelines from TargetingPack version check #39303
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • Add support for DI in Hub methods #34047
    area-signalr
  • Fix some fast up to date check issues in VS #32140
    area-infrastructure, retrospective-action
  • Adding EntryAssembly to AddRazorPages/AddControllers* #39085
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ListView not displayed on Android since updating on prev. 11 #4007

  • iOS BlazorWebView not working with CORS Access-Control-Allow-Credentials endpoints #4003

PullRequests

Created

  • Move SwipeView Gallery into Maui Samples Gallery #4002

Updated

  • Swipe View Handler #3987
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NpgsqlTsVector.Matches() does not honour the TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION #27146
  • Include for multiple entities on the same sub-level #27145

Closed

  • When looking up methods via reflection, be trimming/AOT-friendly #26288
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27144
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Stop using GetRequired* reflection wrappers to enable trimming #27099
  • Stop prefixing check constraints. #27142
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Query: Assign proper type to CollectionResultExpression #27134
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
